reviews.review:
Amazing, violent, unexpected and sad. Comically exact but even with that couldn't help but cry at the end. Die who we didn't think would and didn't who we said would die. 
I love it, fantastic.
10 years later and it never ceases to spectate and amaze the audience with every plot twist.

Fun and a triumphant mega blockbuster from Marvel! I had no idea how they where going to pull it off but focusing the film on Thanos did the trick! A few characters where left out in the cold for development but all the main pieces where there! Lucasfilm should listen to Marvel some fan service goes a long way!

Tons of fun with a lot of great candy for fans to enjoy. If you haven't seen the other movies why are you even seeing it then? Don't complain about a movie that clearly let's you know it's not a standalone.

Alright Major Spoilers Ahead but if you haven't seen the movie yet what are you even doing here

This was the best marvel movie to date! I know that it's a very small force but I still can't believe people thought Thanos was a weak villain. Thanos was the best part of the movie except maybe for Thor. People may say that the ending sucks because they kill off half the heroes (and the Russo Brothers did confirm that all the deaths were real) but that's what makes Infinity war special! Without something as dramatic as killing off even main characters such as Spiderman and Star Lord, this would just be another superhero movie,  and nothing more. Thanos had a clear and amazing backstory, I think all the characters got just the right amount of screen time, and I think they did really well with not giving thanos a big character introduction. He has plenty of arc, but we've been hearing about thanos since 2011 in Avengers, so he didn't need setup. I wouldn't change I thing about this movie, I just want to see it more!
A ton of fast paced entertainment and much more fun than the majority of superhero blockbusters
TREMENDOUSLY INTRIGUING BEST MOVIE IVE SEEN

Great extension of the MCU. Heartfelt, hilarious and so much fun. BUT I am more looking forward to AntMan and The Wasp! The heroes were all there, but i think there should have been just a little bit more behind it.
Very great <3 everyone should watch it
